review: pretty awesome experience yesterday for my sons 12th Bday. Good value and great fun.

room_title: Escape room "Detention" by Key Quest in Boston
review: Highly recommend to do with your kids. Had so much fun, can't wait to go back.

room_title: Escape room "Detention" by Key Quest in Boston
review: A great back-to-school experience. The staff was welcoming and let us play even though we were late. Will come again to check out the other rooms
